mission.posting: Help an angry critic get his revenge on some game developers.

email.subject: Dishonest Developers
email.body:
Okay #PLAYERNAME#, this contract should be fun.
There's this game company called Oblivion Digital, ever heard of them? Well, the gaming community has been hyped for months now about a game that they have been developing called "Nano Ninja"... it was a flop.
So, naturally there was a lot of uproar from fans, however, Oblivion Digital aren't standing for criticism on their game and have resorted to banning people from their forums.
One of those people, a critic named Tymek, came to us with an offer. If we manage to get into Oblivion Digital's network and replace his IP address with the lead developer's, we'll be in for a large sum of money. The best part is the fool leading the studio will be clueless as to why he can't connect to his own servers, I wonder how many angry calls and emails it'll take to fix?
The critic's IP address and the company's mainframe is linked below however you'll have to do some rooting around for any other information you need.
TLDR: Gain access to the mainframe, find the lead developer's IP address, edit the blacklist found on the mainframe and replace the IP address listed below with the lead developer's.

attachments.note: To edit text on a document simply use the command 'replace' followed by the string you wish to replace, surrounded by speech marks. Finally add what you want the text to be replaced with surround with another pair of speech marks. Example: replace "hello world" "bye world" The above example would result in the first string (hello world) being replaced with the second string (bye world).
